title: The Truth Behind Nemesis
body: If you don't know what the knew nemesis draft game mode on the PBE is, it's a game mode where you pick champions for the enemy team to play. I think Riot are really doing this to discover what we think are truly the worst champs, and are going to buff them. {{champion:83}} I'm onto you, Riot...

replies.body: Haha I thought this as well when it was announced xD  Although who we think are the worst aren't necessarily the worst champions.
